one.text:
Hi and Wellcome to my place!
My name is Petar Ivanov. I'm from Varna- Bulgaria, and I like programming a lot.
 My job is in a call-center, working for a big ISP. In my free time I do some bodyweight exercises and running.
 I like mostly scripting languages like Python and Javascript, but in this project I used some techniques in HTML and CSS to make this site more friendly. 
 Hope you like it! 
:)

three.name: Other Projects:
three.text:
I also have other projects, you can take a look of them here:

CalculatorPy- it's a simple calculator, written in Python 3, using some Tkinter for GUI build.

The Web-Scrapper- a gui project from the book 'Learning Python'- Fabrizio Romano.

two.name: This Project:
two.text:
The page is writen on HTML, styled
with CSS, and maked alive with some JS.
 For db, I used a simple JSON file, cause it's easy to work with it.

four.name: My Library:
four.text:
'Knowledge is power!'
Yes it's true, but to know more, you have to read. Here are the sources for my knowledge in programming:
w3schools.com- here you can learn much for the web- programming- HTML, CSS, JavaScript and much more- it's all in.
Learning Python- Fabrizio Romano- a book for Python 3 programming from A to Z, here I learned a lot. This copy was free- downloaded from the Python.org.
